A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: i have never in my life left a Star Wars film feeing as disappointed\, overwhelmed\, and sickened by what i just witnessed for 2 & 1/2 hours. Forced unnecessary one-liners and comedy\, too much reliance on cutesy animals than on a cohesive plot with proper characterization and development. an ending that left much to be desired. Terrible writing. Adam Driver's performance was the only thing worthwhile in this. i've been a lifelong fan and after TLJ\, i'm not sure i'll ever bother with another Star Wars movie and certainly not one Rian Johnson got his hands on.
